scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.mobile#debug_start_dev: ts-node ./scripts/modify-env.cjs dev     ios     && turbo watch start --filter=mobile
scripts.mobile#debug_android_dev: ts-node ./scripts/modify-env.cjs dev     android && turbo watch debug --filter=mobile
scripts.mobile#debug_ios_dev: ts-node ./scripts/modify-env.cjs dev     ios     && turbo watch debug --filter=mobile
scripts.mobile#build_android_prod: ts-node ./scripts/modify-env.cjs prod    android && turbo run build --filter=mobile -- --profile production     --platform android  --non-interactive --output ./build/prod/app.apk
scripts.mobile#build_android_prodAab: ts-node ./scripts/modify-env.cjs prodAab android && turbo run build --filter=mobile -- --profile production:aab --platform android  --non-interactive --output ./build/prodAab/app.aab
scripts.mobile#build_ios_prod: ts-node ./scripts/modify-env.cjs prod    ios     && turbo run build_app && cd apps/mobile && yarn build -- --profile production     --platform ios      --non-interactive --output ./build/prod/app.ipa
